programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Larry the Floor Manager - Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Royal Pain - When Brittany becomes convinced she's a long lost princess she carries her new royal status a little too far.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Theodore's Calling / Clumsy Jeanette - Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life. // Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her... or her new glasses?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting / Alvin's Assistant - Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old. // Kevin agrees to be Alvin's assistant to get closer to the music industry, but ends up running errands instead.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep269
programme.desc: Under the Small Top / Squidward's Sick Daze - Squidward's house becomes infested with a mail-order flea circus meant for SpongeBob. // Squidward fakes being sick to get out of work, but his agony only begins when SpongeBob arrives to care for him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep270
programme.desc: Goofy Scoopers / Pat the Dog - SpongeBob and Patrick make it their mission to reunite the recently fires robot band from Goofy Goober's. // Patrick is sent to the pound for acting like a worm, but he won't be able to leave unless SpongeBob can train him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep246
programme.desc: Plankton's Old Chum - Where Plankton usually dumps his rotten chum is too full, so he tricks SpongeBob into hiding it around the city.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Quest for Tire / Cabin of Curiosities - The weekly food delivery truck goes missing, so the campers must hunt it down like their primal ancestors. // A mysterious cabin of odd campers have frightful fun with SpongeBob and Patrick after dark.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Roll Model with the Casagrandes / No Show with the Casagrandes - When Carl witnesses Ronnie Anne save a dog, he becomes obsessed with being just like his newfound hero. // Ronnie Anne secretly starts watching her family's favorite telenovela after refusing to watch it with them.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Face the Music with the Casagrandes / Pranks for the Memories with the Casagrandes - When Ronnie Anne discovers that each family member will perform for Hector's birthday, she turns to Sid for help. // Ronnie Anne's attempts to bond with her cool older cousin Carlota lead to a prank war against the boy cousins.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Store Wars with the Casagrandes / Lucha Fever with the Casagrandes - When a fancy new grocery store opens on the block, Bobby rallies the family to do everything they can to compete. // Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lubra Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Tripped! - Everyone in the family has been working hard to save up for a family vacation. But while road tripping to their destination, everything that can go for the family wrong does.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep257
programme.desc: Handemonium / Breakin' - Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep258
programme.desc: Boss for a Day - Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep242
programme.desc: FarmerBob / Gary & Spot - SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins' farm, much to his dismay. // Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal - Spot.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep519
programme.desc: Alvin Gets Schooled - When Dave learns Alvin blamed him for his poor grades to Miss Smith, Dave sets down a very strict study schedule.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep420
programme.desc: The Chosen Chipmunk / Double Dangus - Alvin sneaks into Simon's new virtual reality game and is transported to a world in desperate need of a hero. // The chipmunks discover Officer Dangus has a twin brother that's a bully and encourage Dangus to stand up to him.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Family is No Picnic / The Undefeated Sammy Dynamite - It's family game day but while Kunal and Neil keep going head to head,Sammy and Raj promise not to get caught up in the competition. // When Kunal tells the boys to find an after-school club, they make an obvious choice: WRESTLING!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lost in Couch / Pat-a-thon - Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Neptune's Ball - The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu - Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Huge - Self-conscious about his size, Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge. Mantis is initially thrilled with the results, but soon his large size puts the entire village and his friends in grave danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep202
programme.desc: The Cave of Two Lovers - On their way to Omashu, the kids meet a group of nomads who show them a short cut through the 'cave of two lovers'.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Night of the Vesuviuses - The annual Zoo Snooze is here! This year the Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets. The zoosters plan to exact revenge on the twins.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Parker Gets the Bird / Anchor Shackleton - Parker tends to a small strawberry garden until its survival is threatened by a horde of ravenous birds. // Parker discovers Angus can't swim, but with the little nimbus' help, the sailor's on his way to becoming a buoy.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The King of Omashu - Aang takes Katara and Sokka back to a favorite place he used to go to when he was younger, the Earth Kingdom City of Omashu. But when they break the law they are taken to the King to get their punishment.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Imprisoned - The kids come to an Earth Nation town which is occupied by the Fire Nation. But will Kataras attempts to inspire the oppressed people help them or hurt them?

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Taken to the Cleaners / Mugshot - Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing at the Dry Cleaners. // In an unfortunate case of mistaken identity, Best has been mistaken for the notorious jewel thief, Jimmy Muggins.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep116

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball Ep156/Ep173
programme.desc: The Parents/The Revolt - Nicole Watterson and her parents reconnect after a long forced absence.

programme.title: Mechamato Ep14
programme.desc: Food Fight - A brutal food review drives robo-chef Garamsey to kidnap Deep. Amato has to save DeEp.before he becomes the next course.

programme.title: Mechamato Ep24
programme.desc: The Toopee Show - Amato and MechaBot are invited to a children's show hosted by squirrel mascot Toopee, but things get weird really fast.

programme.title: Lamput Ep303/Ep309/Ep317/Ep319/Ep321/Ep327
programme.desc: The Split/Origins/Transfer Gun/Skinny's Dance Night/Lamput & The Elephant/Doc And The Thief - The strain of constant failure gets too much for the Docs, and their friendship breaks down once and for all.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Ep1365/Ep1320/Ep1321/Ep1322/Ep1366
programme.desc: Tv Knight 8/Pig In A Poke/P.P./A Little Help Please/A Stickier Situation - Batman joins commissioner Gordon at the GCPD.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball Ep43B/Ep44A/Ep44B
programme.desc: The Vacation/The Fraud/The Void - The kids complain so much they become actual charity cases.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons Ep125/Ep127
programme.desc: Bounty Bunny/Hole Gag: Underwear/Vender Bender/Raging Granny/Daffy Psychic: Famous/Spare Me - Yosemite Sam goes on a Bugs "Bounty" hunt.

programme.title: We Baby Bears Ep32/Ep20
programme.desc: Back To Our Regular Time Period/A Tale Of Two Ice Bears - The Bears find themselves trapped in the wrong time period.

programme.title: Lego Dreamzzz Ep119

programme.title: Mechamato Ep10
programme.desc: The Arsonist - Amato and friends rush to help put out a fire, but they start to suspect that someone or something may be behind it.

programme.title: We Bare Bears Ep93/Ep94
programme.desc: Spa Day/Tubin' - The Bears have a relaxing day at the spa. Grizz tries to get everything the spa has to offer. Panda gets trapped in the steam room with an old man. And Ice Bear plays ping pong.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Ep181/Ep252
programme.desc: Chapter Two: The Story In Your Eyes/What We Learned At Camp - Without Cyborg, Beast Boy feels lost and sets out to find himself, but ends up meeting a music legend.

programme.desc: We Fixed A Truck/Apple Wedding - Finn finds an old truck, and Jake calls Banana Man to help with the repairs.

programme.title: Chowder Ep10A/Ep10B/Ep11A/Ep11B/Ep12A

programme.title: Black Snow Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Rumours and gossip are spreading around Ashford and suspicion is cast over Joe. Cormack continues to interview the 'time capsule kids' and more secrets rise to the surface.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Dolphins Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A new history begins, but the Dolphins' journey is far from a comfortable ride...

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - After returning from overseas, sculptor Ben Gilbert stumbled across a 100 year old abandoned sawmill in Victoria's north east and convinced the council to let him build a caretaker's cottage on the site.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep37
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Kirsten Aiken and The Business team bring you comprehensive coverage, reaction and analysis of today's RBA decision on interest rates plus what we learnt from RBA Governor Michele Bullock's media conference.

programme.title: The World Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - A new set of teens aged from 14-16 years old, and seniors aged from 71-94 years old who live in a retirement village come together for an inspirational and powerful intergenerational experiment.

programme.title: Nemesis Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In this episode, Tony Abbott's allies and enemies take us through those tumultuous years, where successes were overshadowed by a politically disastrous first Budget to eye popping moments of onion eating.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - After returning from overseas, sculptor Ben Gilbert stumbled across a 100 year old abandoned sawmill in Victoria's north east and convinced the council to let him build a caretaker's cottage on the site.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Costa Georgiadis visits a farming club for city kids, Sophie Thomson gets summer watering tips from an expert, Tino Carnevale explores the secret world of saltmarshes and Josh Byrne propagates succulents.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.title: The Business Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Kirsten Aiken and The Business team bring you comprehensive coverage, reaction and analysis of today's RBA decision on interest rates plus what we learnt from RBA Governor Michele Bullock's media conference.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: The World Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Emma Rebellato and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: If You're Listening Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - As well as fighting Russia, Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy now also has to fight Israel and Hamas for the world's attention. Can he get the world to care about Ukraine again? If not, what will that mean for the war?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Costa Georgiadis visits a rental garden brimming with Aussie native plants in pots, Josh Byrne learns how a native marsupial is regenerating its plant filled habitat, Sophie Thomson visits an artist's stunning home garden.

programme.title: Art Works Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - This week we find inspiration with Lindy Lee; meet Halo Vocal Ensemble and art influenced by dogs; Namila chats with Jordy van den Nieuwendijk; and the latest in our Instrumental Series with Koto master Satsuki Odamura.

programme.title: Framed Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The rumours start to bite. A chain reaction has now been set in motion. A series of unintended consequences reveal the true legacy of the theft of the Weeping Woman.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a brave and fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ernie takes in 360 views of Augusta from an iconic lighthouse, Narelda learns the fascinating history of whaling of Eden and Aaron connects with a Cape York local making an impact in her community.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Art van Dyke and Troy West are charmed by the cluster of 1850s stone cottages near their B&B at the historic Ravenswood mansion near Bendigo in Victoria. It is here they plan to build a brutalist contemporary concrete box.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep38

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep4
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dolidze vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The second month of 2024 will get off to a rousing start in the Octagon, as middleweight contenders Roman Dolidze and Nassourdine Imavov collide in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas on Saturday, February 4. A Georgian powerhouse whose last three wins have seen him knock out Kyle Daukaus, Phil Hawes and Jack Hermansson, Dolidze will be seeking another highlight reel finish against Imavov, who holds victories over the likes of Edmen Shahbazyan and Joaquin Buckley

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dolidze vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Main Event - The second month of 2024 will get off to a rousing start in the Octagon, as middleweight contenders Roman Dolidze and Nassourdine Imavov collide in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas on Saturday, February 4. A Georgian powerhouse whose last three wins have seen him knock out Kyle Daukaus, Phil Hawes and Jack Hermansson, Dolidze will be seeking another highlight reel finish against Imavov, who holds victories over the likes of Edmen Shahbazyan and Joaquin Buckley

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.
